name: Dancing Lights
short_description: : Creates torches or other lights.

name: Daze
short_description: : A single humanoid creature with 4 HD or less loses its next action.

name: Detect Magic
short_description: : Detects all spells and magic items within 60 ft.

name: Flare
short_description: : Dazzles one creature (–1 on attack rolls).

name: Ghost Sound
short_description: : Figment sounds.

name: Know Direction
short_description: : You discern north.

name: Light
short_description: : Object shines like a torch.

name: Lullaby
short_description: : Makes subject drowsy: –5 on Perception checks, –2 on Will saves against sleep.

name: Mage Hand
short_description: : 5-pound telekinesis.

name: Mending
short_description: : Makes minor repairs on an object.

name: Message
short_description: : Whisper conversation at distance.

name: Open/Close
short_description: : Opens or closes small or light things.

name: Prestidigitation
short_description: : Performs minor tricks.

name: Read Magic
short_description: : Read scrolls and spellbooks.

name: Resistance
short_description: : Subject gains +1 on saving throws.

name: Summon Instrument
short_description: : Summons one musical instrument.

name: Alarm
short_description: : Wards an area for 2 hours/level.

name: Animate Rope
short_description: : Makes a rope move at your command.

name: Cause Fear
short_description: : One creature of 5 HD or less flees for 1d4 rounds.

name: Charm Person
short_description: : Makes one person your friend.

name: Comprehend Languages
short_description: : You understand all spoken and written languages.

name: Confusion, Lesser
short_description: : One creature is confused for 1 round.

name: Cure Light Wounds
short_description: : Cures 1d8 damage + 1/level (max +5).

name: Detect Secret Doors
short_description: : Reveals hidden doors within 60 ft.

name: Disguise Self
short_description: : Changes your appearance.

name: Erase
short_description: : Mundane or magical writing vanishes.

name: Expeditious Retreat
short_description: : Your base speed increases by 30 ft.

name: Feather Fall
short_description: : Objects or creatures fall slowly.

name: Grease
short_description: : Makes 10-ft. square or one object slippery.

name: Hideous Laughter
short_description: : Subject loses actions for 1 round/level.

name: Hypnotism
short_description: : Fascinates 2d4 HD of creatures.

name: Identify
short_description: : Gives +10 bonus to identify magic items.

name: Magic Aura
short_description: : Alters object's magic aura.

name: Magic Mouth
short_description: M: Object speaks once when triggered.

name: Obscure Object
short_description: : Masks object against scrying.

name: Remove Fear
short_description: : Suppresses fear or gives +4 on saves against fear for one subject + one per four levels.

name: Silent Image
short_description: : Creates minor illusion of your design.

name: Sleep
short_description: : Puts 4 HD of creatures into magical slumber.

name: Summon Monster I
short_description: : Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

name: Undetectable Alignment
short_description: : Conceals alignment from magical detection for 24 hours.

name: Unseen Servant
short_description: : Invisible force obeys your commands.

name: Ventriloquism
short_description: : Throws voice for 1 min./level.

name: Alter Self
short_description: : Assume form of a Small or Medium humanoid.

name: Animal Messenger
short_description: : Sends a Tiny animal to a specific place.

name: Animal Trance
short_description: : Fascinates 2d6 HD of animals.

name: Blindness/Deafness
short_description: : Makes subject blinded or deafened.

name: Blur
short_description: : Attacks miss subject 20% of the time.

name: Calm Emotions
short_description: : Calms creatures, negating emotion effects.

name: Cat's Grace
short_description: : Subject gains +4 to Dex for 1 min./level.

name: Cure Moderate Wounds
short_description: : Cures 2d8 damage +1/level (max. +10).

name: Darkness
short_description: : 20-ft. radius of supernatural shadow.

name: Daze Monster
short_description: : Living creature of 6 HD or less loses its next action.

name: Delay Poison
short_description: : Stops poison from harming subject for 1 hour/level.

name: Detect Thoughts
short_description: : Allows "listening" to surface thoughts.

name: Eagle's Splendor
short_description: : Subject gains +4 to Cha for 1 min./level.

name: Enthrall
short_description: : Captivates all within 100 ft. + 10 ft./level.

name: Fox's Cunning
short_description: : Subject gains +4 to Int for 1 min./level.

name: Glitterdust
short_description: : Blinds creatures, outlines invisible creatures.

name: Heroism
short_description: : Gives +2 bonus on attack rolls, saves, skill checks.

name: Hold Person
short_description: : Paralyzes one humanoid for 1 round/level.

name: Hypnotic Pattern
short_description: : Fascinates 2d4 + level HD of creatures.

name: Invisibility
short_description: : Subject is invisible for 1 min./level or until it attacks.

name: Locate Object
short_description: : Senses direction toward object (specific or type).

name: Minor Image
short_description: : As silent image, plus some sound.

name: Mirror Image
short_description: : Creates decoy duplicates of you.

name: Misdirection
short_description: : Misleads divinations for 1 creature or object.

name: Pyrotechnics
short_description: : Turns fire into blinding light or thick smoke.

name: Rage
short_description: : Gives +2 to Str and Con, +1 on Will saves, –2 to AC.

name: Scare
short_description: : Frightens creatures of less than 6 HD.

name: Shatter
short_description: : Sonic energy damages objects or crystalline creatures.

name: Silence
short_description: : Negates sound in 20-ft. radius.

name: Sound Burst
short_description: : Deals 1d8 sonic damage to subjects; may stun them.

name: Suggestion
short_description: : Compels a subject to follow stated course of action.

name: Summon Monster II
short_description: : Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

name: Summon Swarm
short_description: : Summons swarm of bats, rats, or spiders.

name: Tongues
short_description: : Speak and understand any language.

name: Whispering Wind
short_description: : Sends a short message 1 mile/level.

name: Blink
short_description: : You randomly vanish and reappear for 1 round per level.

name: Charm Monster
short_description: : Makes monster believe it is your ally.

name: Clairaudience/Clairvoyance
short_description: : Hear or see at a distance for 1 min./level.

name: Confusion
short_description: : Subjects behave oddly for 1 round/level.

name: Crushing Despair
short_description: : Subjects take –2 on attack rolls, damage rolls, saves, and checks.

name: Cure Serious Wounds
short_description: : Cures 3d8 damage + 1/level (max +15).

name: Daylight
short_description: : 60-ft. radius of bright light.

name: Deep Slumber
short_description: : Puts 10 HD of creatures to sleep.

name: Dispel Magic
short_description: : Cancels one magical spell or effect.

name: Displacement
short_description: : Attacks miss subject 50% of the time.

name: Fear
short_description: : Subjects within cone flee for 1 round/level.

name: Gaseous Form
short_description: : Subject becomes insubstantial and can fly slowly.

name: Geas, Lesser
short_description: : Commands subject of 7 HD or less.

name: Glibness
short_description: : You gain +20 bonus on Bluff checks, and your lies can escape magical discernment.

name: Good Hope
short_description: : Subjects gain +2 on attack rolls, damage rolls, saves, and checks.

name: Haste
short_description: : One creature/level moves faster, +1 on attack rolls, AC, and Reflex saves.

name: Illusory Script
short_description: M: Only select creatures can read text.

name: Invisibility Sphere
short_description: : Makes everyone within 10 ft. invisible.

name: Major Image
short_description: : As silent image, plus sound, smell and thermal effects.

name: Phantom Steed
short_description: : Magic horse appears for 1 hour/level.

name: Remove Curse
short_description: : Frees object or person from curse.

name: Scrying
short_description: F: Spies on subject from a distance.

name: Sculpt Sound
short_description: : Creates new sounds or changes existing ones into new sounds.

name: Secret Page
short_description: : Changes one page to hide its real content.

name: See Invisibility
short_description: : Reveals invisible creatures or objects.

name: Sepia Snake Sigil
short_description: M: Creates text symbol that immobilizes reader.

name: Slow
short_description: : One subject/level takes only one action/round, –1 to AC, Reflex saves, and attack rolls.

name: Speak with Animals
short_description: : You can communicate with animals.

name: Summon Monster III
short_description: : Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

name: Tiny Hut
short_description: : Creates shelter for 10 creatures.

name: Break Enchantment
short_description: : Frees subjects from enchantments, transmutations, and curses.

name: Cure Critical Wounds
short_description: : Cures 4d8 damage + 1/level (max +20).

name: Detect Scrying
short_description: : Alerts you to magical eavesdropping

name: Dimension Door
short_description: : Teleports you a short distance.

name: Dominate Person
short_description: : Controls humanoid telepathically.

name: Freedom of Movement
short_description: : Subject moves normally despite impediments to movement.

name: Hallucinatory Terrain
short_description: : Makes one type of terrain appear like another (field as forest, or the like).

name: Hold Monster
short_description: : As hold person, but any creature.

name: Invisibility, Greater
short_description: : As invisibility, but subject can attack and stay invisible.

name: Legend Lore
short_description: MF: Lets you learn tales about a person, place, or thing.

name: Locate Creature
short_description: : Indicates direction to familiar creature.

name: Modify Memory
short_description: : Changes 5 minutes of subject's memories.

name: Neutralize Poison
short_description: : Immunizes subject against poison, detoxifies venom in or on subject.

name: Rainbow Pattern
short_description: : Lights fascinate 24 HD of creatures.

name: Repel Vermin
short_description: : Insects, spiders, and other vermin stay 10 ft. away.

name: Secure Shelter
short_description: : Creates sturdy cottage.

name: Shadow Conjuration
short_description: : Mimics conjuration below 4th level, but only 20% real.

name: Shout
short_description: : Deafens all within cone and deals 5d6 sonic damage.

name: Speak with Plants
short_description: : You can talk to plants and plant creatures.

name: Summon Monster IV
short_description: : Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

name: Zone of Silence
short_description: : Keeps eavesdroppers from overhearing you.

name: Cure Light Wounds, Mass
short_description: : Cures 1d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

name: Dispel Magic, Greater
short_description: : As dispel magic, but with multiple targets.

name: Dream
short_description: : Sends message to anyone sleeping.

name: False Vision
short_description: M: Fools scrying with an illusion.

name: Heroism, Greater
short_description: : Gives +4 bonus on attack rolls, saves, skill checks; immunity to fear; temporary hp.

name: Mind Fog
short_description: : Subjects in fog get –10 to Wis and Will checks.

name: Mirage Arcana
short_description: : As hallucinatory terrain, plus structures.

name: Mislead
short_description: : Turns you invisible and creates illusory double.

name: Nightmare
short_description: : Sends vision dealing 1d10 damage, fatigue.

name: Persistent Image
short_description: : As major image, but with no concentration required.

name: Seeming
short_description: : Changes appearance of 1 person per 2 levels.

name: Shadow Evocation
short_description: : Mimics evocation below 5th level, but only 20% real.

name: Shadow Walk
short_description: : Step into shadow to travel rapidly.

name: Song of Discord
short_description: : Forces targets to attack each other.

name: Suggestion, Mass
short_description: : As suggestion, affects 1 subject/level.

name: Summon Monster V
short_description: : Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

name: Analyze Dweomer
short_description: F: Reveals magical aspects of subject.

name: Animate Objects
short_description: : Objects attack your foes.

name: Cat's Grace, Mass
short_description: : As cat's grace, affects 1 subject/level.

name: Charm Monster, Mass
short_description: : As charm monster, but all within 30 ft.

name: Cure Moderate Wounds, Mass
short_description: : Cures 2d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

name: Eagle's Splendor, Mass
short_description: : As eagle's splendor, 1 subject/level.

name: Eyebite
short_description: : Target becomes panicked, sickened, and comatose.

name: Find the Path
short_description: : Shows most direct way to a location.

name: Fox's Cunning, Mass
short_description: : As fox's cunning, affects 1 subject/ level.

name: Geas/Quest
short_description: : As lesser geas, but affects any creature.

name: Heroes' Feast
short_description: : Food for one creature/level cures and grants combat bonuses.

name: Irresistible Dance
short_description: : Forces subject to dance.

name: Permanent Image
short_description: : Permanent illusion, includes sight, sound, smell, and thermal effects.

name: Programmed Image
short_description: M: As major image, but triggered by event.

name: Project Image
short_description: : Illusory double can talk and cast spells.

name: Scrying, Greater
short_description: : As scrying, but faster and longer.

name: Shout, Greater
short_description: : Devastating yell deals 10d6 sonic damage; stuns creatures.

name: Summon Monster VI
short_description: : Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

name: Sympathetic Vibration
short_description: : Deals 2d10 damage/round to freestanding structure.

name: Veil
short_description: : Changes appearance of a group of creatures.

name: Bleed
short_description: : Cause a stabilized creature to resume dying.

name: Create Water
short_description: : Creates 2 gallons/level of pure water.

name: Detect Poison
short_description: : Detects poison in one creature or small object.

name: Guidance
short_description: : +1 on one attack roll, saving throw, or skill check.

name: Purify Food and Drink
short_description: : Purifies 1 cu. ft./level of food or water.

name: Stabilize
short_description: : Cause a dying creature to stabilize.

name: Virtue
short_description: : Subject gains 1 temporary hp.

name: Bane
short_description: : Enemies take –1 on attack rolls and saves against fear.

name: Bless
short_description: : Allies gain +1 on attack rolls and saves against fear.

name: Bless Water
short_description: M: Makes holy water.

name: Command
short_description: : One subject obeys selected command for 1 round.

name: Curse Water
short_description: M: Makes unholy water.

name: Deathwatch
short_description: : Reveals how near death subjects within 30 ft. are.

name: Detect Chaos/Evil/Good/Law
short_description: : Reveals creatures, spells, or objects of selected alignment.

name: Detect Undead
short_description: : Reveals undead within 60 ft.

name: Divine Favor
short_description: : You gain +1 per three levels on attack and damage rolls.

name: Doom
short_description: : One subject takes –2 on attack rolls, damage rolls, saves, and checks.

name: Endure Elements
short_description: : Exist comfortably in hot or cold regions.

name: Entropic Shield
short_description: : Ranged attacks against you have 20% miss chance.

name: Hide from Undead
short_description: : Undead can't perceive one subject/level.

name: Inflict Light Wounds
short_description: : Touch deals 1d8 damage +1/level (max +5).

name: Magic Stone
short_description: : Three stones gain +1 on attack rolls, deal 1d6+1 damage.

name: Magic Weapon
short_description: : Weapon gains +1 bonus.

name: Obscuring Mist
short_description: : Fog surrounds you.

name: Protection from Chaos/Evil/Good/Law
short_description: : +2 to AC and saves, plus additional protection against selected alignment.

name: Sanctuary
short_description: : Opponents can't attack you, and you can't attack.

name: Shield of Faith
short_description: : Aura grants +2 or higher deflection bonus.

name: Aid
short_description: : +1 on attack rolls and saves against fear, 1d8 temporary hp +1/level (max +10).

name: Align Weapon
short_description: : Weapon becomes good, evil, lawful, or chaotic.

name: Augury
short_description: MF: Learns whether an action will be good or bad.

name: Bear's Endurance
short_description: : Subject gains +4 to Con for 1 min./level.

name: Bull's Strength
short_description: : Subject gains +4 to Str for 1 min./level.

name: Consecrate
short_description: M: Fills area with positive energy, weakening undead.

name: Death Knell
short_description: : Kills dying creature; you gain 1d8 temporary hp, +2 to Str, and +1 caster level.

name: Desecrate
short_description: M: Fills area with negative energy, making undead stronger.

name: Find Traps
short_description: : Notice traps as a rogue does.

name: Gentle Repose
short_description: : Preserves one corpse.

name: Inflict Moderate Wounds
short_description: : Touch attack, 2d8 damage + 1/level (max +10).

name: Make Whole
short_description: : Repairs an object.

name: Owl's Wisdom
short_description: : Subject gains +4 to Wis for 1 min./level.

name: Remove Paralysis
short_description: : Frees one or more creatures from paralysis or slow effect.

name: Resist Energy
short_description: : Ignores first 10 (or more) points of damage per attack from specified energy type.

name: Restoration, Lesser
short_description: : Dispels magical ability penalty or repairs 1d4 ability damage.

name: Shield Other
short_description: F: You take half of subject's damage.

name: Spiritual Weapon
short_description: : Magic weapon attacks on its own.

name: Status
short_description: : Monitors condition, position of allies.

name: Zone of Truth
short_description: : Subjects within range cannot lie.

name: Animate Dead
short_description: M: Creates undead skeletons and zombies out of corpses.

name: Bestow Curse
short_description: : –6 to an ability score; –4 on attack rolls, saves, and checks; or 50% chance of losing each action.

name: Contagion
short_description: : Infects subject with chosen disease.

name: Continual Flame
short_description: M: Makes a permanent, heatless light.

name: Create Food and Water
short_description: : Feeds three humans (or one horse)/level.

name: Deeper Darkness
short_description: : Object sheds supernatural shadow in 60-ft. radius.

name: Glyph of Warding
short_description: M: Inscription harms those who pass it.

name: Helping Hand
short_description: : Ghostly hand leads subject to you.

name: Inflict Serious Wounds
short_description: : Touch attack, 3d8 damage + 1/level (max +15).

name: Invisibility Purge
short_description: : Dispels invisibility within 5 ft./level.

name: Magic Circle against Chaos/Evil/Good/Law
short_description: : As protection spells, but 10-ft. radius and 10 min./level.

name: Magic Vestment
short_description: : Armor or shield gains +1 enhancement per four levels.

name: Meld into Stone
short_description: : You and your gear merge with stone.

name: Prayer
short_description: : Allies get +1 bonus on most rolls, enemies –1 penalty.

name: Protection from Energy
short_description: : Absorbs 12 points/level of damage from one kind of energy.

name: Remove Blindness/Deafness
short_description: : Cures normal or magical blindness or deafness.

name: Remove Disease
short_description: : Cures all diseases affecting subject.

name: Searing Light
short_description: : Ray deals 1d8/two levels damage (more against undead).

name: Speak with Dead
short_description: : Corpse answers one question/two levels.

name: Stone Shape
short_description: : Sculpts stone into any shape.

name: Water Breathing
short_description: : Subjects can breathe underwater.

name: Water Walk
short_description: : Subject treads on water as if solid.

name: Wind Wall
short_description: : Deflects arrows, smaller creatures, and gases.

name: Air Walk
short_description: : Subject treads on air as if solid (climb or descend at 45-degree angle).

name: Chaos Hammer
short_description: : Harms and slows lawful creatures (1d8 damage/2 levels).

name: Control Water
short_description: : Raises or lowers bodies of water.

name: Death Ward
short_description: : Grants bonuses against death spells and negative energy.

name: Dimensional Anchor
short_description: : Bars extradimensional movement.

name: Discern Lies
short_description: : Reveals deliberate falsehoods.

name: Dismissal
short_description: : Forces a creature to return to its native plane.

name: Divination
short_description: M: Provides useful advice for specific proposed actions.

name: Divine Power
short_description: : You gain attack bonuses and 1 hp/level.

name: Giant Vermin
short_description: : Turns centipedes, scorpions, or spiders into giant vermin.

name: Holy Smite
short_description: : Harms and possibly blinds evil creatures (1d8 damage/2 levels).

name: Imbue with Spell Ability
short_description: : Transfer spells to subject.

name: Inflict Critical Wounds
short_description: : Touch attack, 4d8 damage + 1/level (max +20).

name: Magic Weapon, Greater
short_description: : Weapon gains +1 bonus/four levels (max +5).

name: Order's Wrath
short_description: : Harms and dazes chaotic creatures (1d8 damage/2 levels).

name: Planar Ally, Lesser
short_description: M: Exchange services with a 6 HD extraplanar creature.

name: Poison
short_description: : Touch deals 1d3 Con damage 1/round for 6 rounds.

name: Restoration
short_description: M: Restores level and ability score drains.

name: Sending
short_description: : Delivers short message anywhere, instantly.

name: Spell Immunity
short_description: : Subject is immune to one spell per 4 levels.

name: Unholy Blight
short_description: : Harms and sickens good creatures (1d8 damage/2 levels).

name: Atonement
short_description: FM: Removes burden of misdeeds from subject.

name: Breath of Life
short_description: : Cures 5d8 damage + 1/level and restores life to recently slain creatures.

name: Command, Greater
short_description: : As command, but affects one subject/level.

name: Commune
short_description: M: Deity answers one yes-or-no question/level.

name: Dispel Chaos/Evil/Good/Law
short_description: : +4 bonus against attacks.

name: Disrupting Weapon
short_description: : Melee weapon destroys undead.

name: Flame Strike
short_description: : Smites foes with divine fire (1d6/level damage).

name: Hallow
short_description: M: Designates location as holy.

name: Inflict Light Wounds, Mass
short_description: : Deals 1d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

name: Insect Plague
short_description: : Wasp swarms attack creatures.

name: Mark of Justice
short_description: : Designates action that triggers curse on subject.

name: Plane Shift
short_description: F: As many as eight subjects travel to another plane.

name: Raise Dead
short_description: M: Restores life to subject who died as long as one day/level ago.

name: Righteous Might
short_description: : Your size increases, and you gain bonuses in combat.

name: Slay Living
short_description: : Touch attack deals 12d6 + 1 per level.

name: Spell Resistance
short_description: : Subject gains SR 12 + level.

name: Symbol of Pain
short_description: M: Triggered rune wracks creatures with pain.

name: Symbol of Sleep
short_description: M: Triggered rune puts nearby creatures into catatonic slumber.

name: True Seeing
short_description: M: Lets you see all things as they really are.

name: Unhallow
short_description: M: Designates location as unholy.

name: Wall of Stone
short_description: : Creates a stone wall that can be shaped.

name: Antilife Shell
short_description: : 10-ft.-radius field hedges out living creatures.

name: Banishment
short_description: : Banishes 2 HD/level of extraplanar creatures.

name: Bear's Endurance, Mass
short_description: : As bear's endurance, affects one subject/level.

name: Blade Barrier
short_description: : Wall of blades deals 1d6/level damage.

name: Bull's Strength, Mass
short_description: : As bull's strength, affects 1 subject per level.

name: Create Undead
short_description: M: Raises ghouls, ghasts, mummies, or mohrgs from physical remains.

name: Forbiddance
short_description: M: Blocks planar travel, damages creatures of different alignment.

name: Glyph of Warding, Greater
short_description: M: As glyph of warding, but up to 10d8 damage or 6th-level spell.

name: Harm
short_description: : Deals 10 points/level damage to target.

name: Heal
short_description: : Cures 10 points/level damage, all diseases and mental conditions.

name: Inflict Moderate Wounds, Mass
short_description: : Deals 2d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

name: Owl's Wisdom, Mass
short_description: : As owl's wisdom, affects 1 subject/level.

name: Planar Ally
short_description: M: As lesser planar ally, but up to 12 HD.

name: Symbol of Fear
short_description: M: Triggered rune panics nearby creatures.

name: Symbol of Persuasion
short_description: M: Triggered rune charms creatures.

name: Undeath to Death
short_description: M: Destroys 1d4/level HD of undead (max. 20d4).

name: Wind Walk
short_description: : You and your allies turn vaporous and travel fast.

name: Word of Recall
short_description: : Teleports you back to designated place.

name: Blasphemy
short_description: : Kills, paralyzes, weakens, or dazes nonevil subjects.

name: Control Weather
short_description: : Changes weather in local area.

name: Cure Serious Wounds, Mass
short_description: : Cures 3d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

name: Destruction
short_description: F: Kills subject and destroys remains.

name: Dictum
short_description: : Kills, paralyzes, staggers, or deafens nonlawful targets.

name: Ethereal Jaunt
short_description: : You become ethereal for 1 round/level.

name: Holy Word
short_description: : Kills, paralyzes, blinds, or deafens nongood subjects.

name: Inflict Serious Wounds, Mass
short_description: : Deals 3d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

name: Refuge
short_description: M: Alters item to transport its possessor to your abode.

name: Regenerate
short_description: : Subject's severed limbs grow back, cures 4d8 damage +1/level (max +35).

name: Repulsion
short_description: F: Creatures can't approach you.

name: Restoration, Greater
short_description: M: As restoration, plus restores all levels and ability scores.

name: Resurrection
short_description: M: Fully restore dead subject.

name: Summon Monster VII
short_description: : Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

name: Symbol of Stunning
short_description: M: Triggered rune stuns creatures.

name: Symbol of Weakness
short_description: M: Triggered rune weakens creatures.

name: Word of Chaos
short_description: : Kills, confuses, stuns, or deafens nonchaotic subjects.

name: Antimagic Field
short_description: : Negates magic within 10 ft.

name: Cloak of Chaos
short_description: F: +4 to AC, +4 resistance, and SR 25 against lawful spells.

name: Create Greater Undead
short_description: M: Creates shadows, wraiths, spectres, or devourers.

name: Cure Critical Wounds, Mass
short_description: : Cures 4d8 damage + 1/level for many creatures.

name: Dimensional Lock
short_description: : Teleportation and interplanar travel blocked for 1 day/level.

name: Discern Location
short_description: : Reveals exact location of creature or object.

name: Earthquake
short_description: : Intense tremor shakes 80-ft.-radius.

name: Fire Storm
short_description: : Deals 1d6/level fire damage.

name: Holy Aura
short_description: F: +4 to AC, +4 resistance, and SR 25 against evil spells.

name: Inflict Critical Wounds, Mass
short_description: : Deals 4d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

name: Planar Ally, Greater
short_description: M: As lesser planar ally, but up to 18 HD.

name: Shield of Law
short_description: F: +4 to AC, +4 resistance, and SR 25 against chaotic spells.

name: Spell Immunity, Greater
short_description: : As spell immunity, but up to 8th-level spells.

name: Summon Monster VIII
short_description: : Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

name: Symbol of Death
short_description: M: Triggered rune kills nearby creatures.

name: Symbol of Insanity
short_description: M: Triggered rune renders nearby creatures insane.

name: Unholy Aura
short_description: F: +4 to AC, +4 resistance, and SR 25 against good spells.

name: Astral Projection
short_description: M: Projects you and companions onto Astral Plane.

name: Energy Drain
short_description: : Subject gains 2d4 negative levels.

name: Etherealness
short_description: : Travel to Ethereal Plane with companions.

name: Gate
short_description: M: Connects two planes for travel or summoning.

name: Heal, Mass
short_description: : As heal, but affects 1 subject/level.

name: Implosion
short_description: : Inflict 10 damage/level to one creature/round.

name: Miracle
short_description: M: Requests a deity's intercession.

name: Soul Bind
short_description: F: Traps newly dead soul to prevent resurrection.

name: Storm of Vengeance
short_description: : Storm rains acid, lightning, and hail.

name: Summon Monster IX
short_description: : Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

name: True Resurrection
short_description: M: As resurrection, plus remains aren't needed.

name: Calm Animals
short_description: : Calms 2d4 + level HD of animals.

name: Charm Animal
short_description: : Makes one animal your friend.

name: Detect Animals or Plants
short_description: : Detects kinds of animals or plants.

name: Detect Snares and Pits
short_description: : Reveals natural or primitive traps.

name: Entangle
short_description: : Plants entangle everyone in 40-ft. radius.

name: Faerie Fire
short_description: : Outlines subjects with light, canceling blur, concealment, and the like.

name: Goodberry
short_description: : 2d4 berries each cure 1 hp (max 8 hp/24 hours).

name: Hide from Animals
short_description: : Animals can't perceive one subject/level.

name: Jump
short_description: : Subject gets bonus on Acrobatics checks.

name: Longstrider
short_description: : Your base speed increases by 10 ft.

name: Magic Fang
short_description: : One natural weapon of subject creature gets +1 on attack and damage rolls.

name: Pass without Trace
short_description: : One subject/level leaves no tracks.

name: Produce Flame
short_description: : 1d6 damage + 1/level, touch or thrown.

name: Shillelagh
short_description: : Cudgel or quarterstaff becomes +1 weapon (2d6 damage) for 1 min./level.

name: Summon Nature's Ally I
short_description: : Summons creature to fight for you.

name: Barkskin
short_description: : Grants +2 (or higher) enhancement to natural armor.

name: Chill Metal
short_description: : Cold metal damages those who touch it.

name: Fire Trap
short_description: M: Opened object deals 1d4 damage + 1/level.

name: Flame Blade
short_description: : Touch attack deals 1d8 + 1/two levels damage.

name: Flaming Sphere
short_description: : Rolling ball of fire deals 3d6 fire damage.

name: Fog Cloud
short_description: : Fog obscures vision.

name: Gust of Wind
short_description: : Blows away or knocks down smaller creatures.

name: Heat Metal
short_description: : Makes metal so hot it damages those who touch it.

name: Hold Animal
short_description: : Paralyzes one animal for 1 round/level.

name: Reduce Animal
short_description: : Shrinks one willing animal.

name: Soften Earth and Stone
short_description: : Turns stone to clay, or dirt to sand or mud.

name: Spider Climb
short_description: : Grants ability to walk on walls and ceilings.

name: Summon Nature's Ally II
short_description: : Summons creature to fight for you.

name: Tree Shape
short_description: : You look exactly like a tree for 1 hour/level.

name: Warp Wood
short_description: : Bends wood.

name: Wood Shape
short_description: : Reshapes wooden objects to suit you.

name: Call Lightning
short_description: : Calls down lightning bolts (3d6 per bolt) from sky.

name: Diminish Plants
short_description: : Reduces size or blights growth of normal plants.

name: Dominate Animal
short_description: : One animal obeys your silent mental commands and orders.

name: Magic Fang, Greater
short_description: : One natural weapon gets + 1/four levels (max. +5).

name: Plant Growth
short_description: : Grows vegetation, improves crops.

name: Quench
short_description: : Extinguishes fires.

name: Sleet Storm
short_description: : Hampers vision and movement.

name: Snare
short_description: : Creates a magic booby trap.

name: Spike Growth
short_description: : Creatures in area take 1d4 damage, may be slowed.

name: Summon Nature's Ally III
short_description: : Summons creature to fight for you.

name: Antiplant Shell
short_description: : Keeps animated plants at bay.

name: Blight
short_description: : Withers one plant or deals 1d6/level damage to plant creature.

name: Command Plants
short_description: : Sway the actions of plant creatures.

name: Ice Storm
short_description: : Hail deals 5d6 damage in cylinder 40 ft. across.

name: Reincarnate
short_description: : Brings dead subject back in a random body.

name: Rusting Grasp
short_description: : Your touch corrodes iron and alloys.

name: Spike Stones
short_description: : Creatures in area take 1d8 damage, may also be slowed.

name: Summon Nature's Ally IV
short_description: : Summons creature to fight for you.

name: Animal Growth
short_description: : One animal doubles in size.

name: Awaken
short_description: M: Animal or tree gains human intellect.

name: Baleful Polymorph
short_description: : Turns subject into harmless animal.

name: Call Lightning Storm
short_description: : As call lightning, but 5d6 damage per bolt.

name: Commune with Nature
short_description: : Learn about terrain for 1 mile/level.

name: Control Winds
short_description: : Changes wind direction and speed.

name: Stoneskin
short_description: M: Grants DR 10/adamantine.

name: Summon Nature's Ally V
short_description: : Summons creature to fight.

name: Transmute Mud to Rock
short_description: : Transforms two 10-ft. cubes per level.

name: Transmute Rock to Mud
short_description: : Transforms two 10-ft. cubes per level.

name: Tree Stride
short_description: : Step from one tree to another far away.

name: Wall of Fire
short_description: : Deals 2d4 fire damage out to 10 ft. and 1d4 out to 20 ft. Passing through wall deals 2d6 damage + 1/level.

name: Wall of Thorns
short_description: : Thorns damage anyone who tries to pass.

name: Fire Seeds
short_description: : Acorns and berries become grenades and bombs.

name: Ironwood
short_description: : Magic wood is as strong as steel.

name: Liveoak
short_description: : Oak becomes treant guardian.

name: Move Earth
short_description: : Digs trenches and builds hills.

name: Repel Wood
short_description: : Pushes away wooden objects.

name: Spellstaff
short_description: : Stores one spell in wooden quarterstaff.

name: Stone Tell
short_description: : Talk to natural or worked stone.

name: Summon Nature's Ally VI
short_description: : Summons creature to fight.

name: Transport via Plants
short_description: : Move instantly from one plant to another of the same kind.

name: Animate Plants
short_description: : One or more plants animate and fight for you.

name: Changestaff
short_description: : Your staff becomes a treant on command.

name: Creeping Doom
short_description: : Swarms of centipedes attack at your command.

name: Summon Nature's Ally VII
short_description: : Summons creature to fight.

name: Sunbeam
short_description: : Beam blinds and deals 4d6 damage.

name: Transmute Metal to Wood
short_description: : Metal within 40 ft. becomes wood.

name: Animal Shapes
short_description: : One ally/level polymorphs into chosen animal.

name: Control Plants
short_description: : Controls actions of one or more plant creatures.

name: Finger of Death
short_description: : Deals 10 damage/level to one subject.

name: Repel Metal or Stone
short_description: : Pushes away metal and stone.

name: Reverse Gravity
short_description: : Objects and creatures fall upward.

name: Summon Nature's Ally VIII
short_description: : Summons creature to fight.

name: Sunburst
short_description: : Blinds all within 10 ft., deals 6d6 damage.

name: Whirlwind
short_description: : Cyclone deals damage and can pick up creatures.

name: Antipathy
short_description: : Object or location affected by spell repels certain creatures.

name: Elemental Swarm
short_description: : Summons multiple elementals.

name: Foresight
short_description: : "Sixth sense" warns of impending danger.

name: Shambler
short_description: : Creates 1d4+2 shambling mounds to fight for you.

name: Shapechange
short_description: F: Transforms you into certain creatures, and lets you change forms once per round.

name: Summon Nature's Ally IX
short_description: : Summons creature to fight.

name: Sympathy
short_description: M: Object or location attracts certain creatures.

name: Bless Weapon
short_description: : Weapon strikes true against evil foes.

name: Protection from Chaos/Evil
short_description: : +2 to AC and saves, plus additional protection against selected alignment.

name: Heal Mount
short_description: : As heal on horse or other special mount.

name: Magic Circle against Chaos/Evil
short_description: : As protection from chaos, but 10-ft. radius and 10 min./level.

name: Dispel Chaos
short_description: : +4 bonus against attacks by chaotic creatures.

name: Dispel Evil
short_description: : +4 bonus against attacks by evil creatures.

name: Holy Sword
short_description: : Weapon becomes +5, deals +2d6 damage against evil.

name: Darkvision
short_description: : See 60 ft. in total darkness.

name: Nondetection
short_description: M: Hides subject from divination, scrying.

name: Acid Splash
short_description: : Orb deals 1d3 acid damage.

name: Ray of Frost
short_description: : Ray deals 1d3 cold damage.

name: Disrupt Undead
short_description: : Deals 1d6 damage to one undead.

name: Touch of Fatigue
short_description: : Touch attack fatigues target.

name: Arcane Mark
short_description: : Inscribes a personal rune on an object or creature (visible or invisible).

name: Hold Portal
short_description: : Holds door shut.

name: Shield
short_description: : Invisible disc gives +4 to AC, blocks magic missiles.

name: Mage Armor
short_description: : Gives subject +4 armor bonus.

name: Mount
short_description: : Summons riding horse for 2 hours/level.

name: True Strike
short_description: : +20 on your next attack roll.

name: Burning Hands
short_description: : 1d4/level fire damage (max 5d4).

name: Floating Disk
short_description: : Creates 3-ft.-diameter horizontal disk that holds 100 lbs./level.

name: Magic Missile
short_description: : 1d4+1 damage; +1 missile per two levels above 1st (max 5).

name: Shocking Grasp
short_description: : Touch delivers 1d6/level electricity damage (max 5d6).

name: Color Spray
short_description: : Knocks unconscious, blinds, and/or stuns weak creatures.

name: Chill Touch
short_description: : One touch/level deals 1d6 damage and possibly 1 Str damage.

name: Ray of Enfeeblement
short_description: : Ray causes 1d6 Str penalty + 1 per 2 levels.

name: Enlarge Person
short_description: : Humanoid creature doubles in size.

name: Reduce Person
short_description: : Humanoid creature halves in size.

name: Arcane Lock
short_description: M: Magically locks a portal or chest.

name: Protection from Arrows
short_description: : Subject gains DR 10/magic against ranged attacks.

name: Acid Arrow
short_description: : Ranged touch attack; 2d4 damage for 1 round + 1 round/three levels.

name: Web
short_description: : Fills 20-ft.-radius spread with sticky spiderwebs that can grapple foes and impair movement.

name: Touch of Idiocy
short_description: : Subject takes 1d6 penalty to Int, Wis, and Cha.

name: Scorching Ray
short_description: : Ranged touch attack deals 4d6 fire damage, + 1 ray/four levels (max 3).

name: Phantom Trap
short_description: M: Makes item seem trapped.

name: Command Undead
short_description: : Undead creature obeys your commands.

name: False Life
short_description: : Gain 1d10 temporary hp + 1/level (max +10).

name: Ghoul Touch
short_description: : Paralyzes one subject, which exudes stench that makes those nearby sickened.

name: Spectral Hand
short_description: : Creates disembodied glowing hand to deliver touch attacks.

name: Knock
short_description: : Opens locked or magically sealed door.

name: Levitate
short_description: : Subject moves up and down at your direction.

name: Rope Trick
short_description: : As many as eight creatures hide in extradimensional space.

name: Explosive Runes
short_description: : Deals 6d6 damage when read.

name: Stinking Cloud
short_description: : Nauseating vapors, 1 round/level.

name: Arcane Sight
short_description: : Magical auras become visible to you.

name: Fireball
short_description: : 1d6 damage per level, 20-ft. radius.

name: Lightning Bolt
short_description: : Electricity deals 1d6/level damage.

name: Halt Undead
short_description: : Immobilizes undead for 1 round/level.

name: Ray of Exhaustion
short_description: : Ray makes subject exhausted.

name: Vampiric Touch
short_description: : Touch deals 1d6 damage per two levels; caster gains damage as temporary hp.

name: Beast Shape I
short_description: : You take the form and some of the powers of a Small or Medium animal.

name: Flame Arrow
short_description: : Arrows deal +1d6 fire damage.

name: Fly
short_description: : Subject flies at speed of 60 ft.

name: Keen Edge
short_description: : Doubles normal weapon's threat range.

name: Shrink Item
short_description: : Object shrinks to one-sixteenth size.

name: Globe of Invulnerability, Lesser
short_description: : Stops 1st- through 3rd-level spell effects.

name: Black Tentacles
short_description: : Tentacles grapple all creatures within a 20-ft. spread.

name: Minor Creation
short_description: : Creates one cloth or wood object.

name: Solid Fog
short_description: : Blocks vision and slows movement.

name: Arcane Eye
short_description: : Invisible floating eye moves 30 ft./round.

name: Fire Shield
short_description: : Creatures attacking you take fire damage; you're protected from heat or cold.

name: Resilient Sphere
short_description: : Force globe protects but traps one subject.

name: Wall of Ice
short_description: : Ice plane creates wall or hemisphere creates dome.

name: Illusory Wall
short_description: : Wall, floor, or ceiling looks real, but anything can pass through.

name: Phantasmal Killer
short_description: : Fearsome illusion kills subject or deals 3d6 damage.

name: Enervation
short_description: : Subject gains 1d4 negative levels.

name: Beast Shape II
short_description: : You take the form and some of the powers of a Tiny or Large animal.

name: Elemental Body I
short_description: : Turns you into a Small elemental.

name: Enlarge Person, Mass
short_description: : 1 humanoid creature/level doubles in size.

name: Mnemonic Enhancer
short_description: F: Wizard only. Prepare extra spells or retain one just cast.

name: Reduce Person, Mass
short_description: : As reduce person, but affects 1 humanoid creature/level.

name: Mage's Private Sanctum
short_description: : Prevents anyone from viewing or scrying an area for 24 hours.

name: Cloudkill
short_description: : Kills 3 HD or less; 4–6 HD save or die, 6+ HD take Con damage.

name: Mage's Faithful Hound
short_description: : Phantom dog can guard a location and attack intruders.

name: Major Creation
short_description: : As minor creation, plus stone and metal.

name: Planar Binding, Lesser
short_description: : Traps extraplanar creature of 6 HD or less until it performs a task.

name: Secret Chest
short_description: F: Hides expensive chest on Ethereal Plane; you retrieve it at will.

name: Teleport
short_description: : Instantly transports you as far as 100 miles per level.

name: Contact Other Plane
short_description: : Lets you ask question of extraplanar entity.

name: Prying Eyes
short_description: : 1d4 + 1/level floating eyes scout for you.

name: Telepathic Bond
short_description: : Link lets allies communicate.

name: Feeblemind
short_description: : Subject's Int and Cha drop to 1.

name: Cone of Cold
short_description: : 1d6/level cold damage.

name: Interposing Hand
short_description: : Hand provides cover against 1 opponent.

name: Wall of Force
short_description: : Wall is immune to damage.

name: Magic Jar
short_description: F: Enables possession of another creature.

name: Waves of Fatigue
short_description: : Several targets become fatigued.

name: Beast Shape III
short_description: : You take the form of a Diminutive or Huge animal, or Small or Medium magical beast.

name: Elemental Body II
short_description: : Turns you into a Medium elemental.

name: Fabricate
short_description: M: Transforms raw materials into finished items.

name: Overland Flight
short_description: : You fly at a speed of 40 ft. and can hustle over long distances.

name: Passwall
short_description: : Creates passage through wood or stone wall.

name: Plant Shape I
short_description: : Turns you into a Small or Medium plant.

name: Polymorph
short_description: : Gives one willing subject a new form.

name: Telekinesis
short_description: : Moves object, attacks creature, or hurls object or creature.

name: Permanency
short_description: M: Makes certain spells permanent.

name: Globe of Invulnerability
short_description: : As lesser globe of invulnerability, plus 4th-level spell effects.

name: Guards and Wards
short_description: : Array of magic effects protect area.

name: Acid Fog
short_description: : Fog deals acid damage.

name: Planar Binding
short_description: : As lesser planar binding, but up to 12 HD.

name: Wall of Iron
short_description: M: 30 hp/four levels; can topple onto foes.

name: Chain Lightning
short_description: : 1d6/level damage and 1 secondary bolt/level.

name: Contingency
short_description: F: Sets trigger condition for another spell.

name: Forceful Hand
short_description: : Hand pushes creatures away.

name: Freezing Sphere
short_description: : Freezes water or deals cold damage.

name: Circle of Death
short_description: M: Kills 1d4/level HD of creatures.

name: Beast Shape IV
short_description: : You take the form of a Diminutive to Huge animal or a Tiny to Large magical beast.

name: Disintegrate
short_description: : Reduces one creature or object to dust.

name: Elemental Body III
short_description: : Turns you into a Large elemental.

name: Flesh to Stone
short_description: : Turns subject creature into statue.

name: Form of the Dragon I
short_description: : Turns you into a Medium dragon.

name: Mage's Lucubration
short_description: : Wizard only. Recalls spell of 5th level or lower.

name: Plant Shape II
short_description: : Turns you into a Large plant creature.

name: Stone to Flesh
short_description: : Restores petrified creature.

name: Transformation
short_description: M: You gain combat bonuses.

name: Sequester
short_description: : Subject is invisible to sight and scrying; renders creature comatose.

name: Spell Turning
short_description: M: Reflect 1d4+6 spell levels back at caster.

name: Instant Summons
short_description: M: Prepared object appears in your hand.

name: Mage's Magnificent Mansion
short_description: F: Door leads to extradimensional mansion.

name: Phase Door
short_description: : Creates an invisible passage through a barrier.

name: Teleport, Greater
short_description: : As teleport, but no range limit and no off-target arrival.

name: Teleport Object
short_description: : As teleport, but affects a touched object.

name: Arcane Sight, Greater
short_description: : As arcane sight, but also reveals magic effects on creatures and objects.

name: Vision
short_description: M: As legend lore, but quicker.

name: Hold Person, Mass
short_description: : As hold person, but all within 30 ft.

name: Insanity
short_description: : Subject suffers continuous confusion.

name: Power Word Blind
short_description: : Blinds creature with 200 hp or less.

name: Delayed Blast Fireball
short_description: : 1d6/level fire damage; you can postpone blast for up to 5 rounds.

name: Forcecage
short_description: M: Cube or cage of force imprisons all inside.

name: Grasping Hand
short_description: : Hand provides cover, pushes, or grapples.

name: Mage's Sword
short_description: F: Floating magic blade strikes opponents.

name: Prismatic Spray
short_description: : Rays hit subjects with variety of effects.

name: Invisibility, Mass
short_description: : As invisibility, but affects all in range.

name: Shadow Conjuration, Greater
short_description: : As shadow conjuration, but up to 6th level and 60% real.

name: Simulacrum
short_description: M: Creates partially real double of a creature.

name: Control Undead
short_description: : Undead don't attack you while under your command.

name: Waves of Exhaustion
short_description: : Several targets become exhausted.

name: Elemental Body IV
short_description: : Turns you into a Huge elemental.

name: Form of the Dragon II
short_description: : Turns you into a Large dragon.

name: Giant Form I
short_description: : Turns you into a Large giant.

name: Plant Shape III
short_description: : Turns you into a Huge plant.

name: Polymorph, Greater
short_description: : Gives one willing subject a new, more powerful form.

name: Statue
short_description: : Subject can become a statue at will.

name: Limited Wish
short_description: M: Alters reality (within limits).

name: Mind Blank
short_description: : Subject is protected from mental/emotional magic and scrying.

name: Prismatic Wall
short_description: : Wall's colors have array of effects.

name: Protection from Spells
short_description: MF: Confers +8 resistance bonus.

name: Incendiary Cloud
short_description: : Cloud deals 6d6 fire damage/round.

name: Maze
short_description: : Traps subject in extradimensional maze.

name: Planar Binding, Greater
short_description: : As lesser planar binding, but up to 18 HD.

name: Trap the Soul
short_description: M: Imprisons subject within gem.

name: Moment of Prescience
short_description: : You gain +1/level insight bonus on single attack roll, check, or save.

name: Prying Eyes, Greater
short_description: : As prying eyes, but eyes have true seeing.

name: Binding
short_description: M: Utilizes an array of techniques to imprison a creature.

name: Demand
short_description: : As sending, plus you can send suggestion.

name: Power Word Stun
short_description: : Stuns creature with 150 hp or less.

name: Clenched Fist
short_description: : Large hand provides cover, pushes, or attacks your foes.

name: Polar Ray
short_description: : Ranged touch attack deals 1d6/level cold damage and 1d4 points of Dexterity drain.

name: Telekinetic Sphere
short_description: : As resilient sphere, but you move the sphere telekinetically.

name: Scintillating Pattern
short_description: : Twisting colors confuse, stun, or render unconscious.

name: Screen
short_description: : Illusion hides area from vision and scrying.

name: Shadow Evocation, Greater
short_description: : As shadow evocation, but up to 7th level and 60% real.

name: Clone
short_description: MF: Duplicate awakens when original dies.

name: Horrid Wilting
short_description: : Deals 1d6/level damage within 30 ft.

name: Form of the Dragon III
short_description: : Turns you into a Huge dragon.

name: Giant Form II
short_description: : Turns you into a Huge giant.

name: Iron Body
short_description: : Your body becomes living iron.

name: Polymorph Any Object
short_description: : Changes a subject into anything else.

name: Temporal Stasis
short_description: M: Puts subject into suspended animation.

name: Freedom
short_description: : Releases creature from imprisonment.

name: Imprisonment
short_description: : Entombs subject beneath the earth.

name: Mage's Disjunction
short_description: : Dispels magic, disenchants magic items.

name: Prismatic Sphere
short_description: : As prismatic wall, but surrounds on all sides.

name: Teleportation Circle
short_description: M: Teleports creatures inside circle.

name: Dominate Monster
short_description: : As dominate person, but any creature.

name: Hold Monster, Mass
short_description: : As hold monster, but all within 30 ft.

name: Power Word Kill
short_description: : Kills one creature with 100 hp or less.

name: Crushing Hand
short_description: : Large hand provides cover, pushes, or crushes your foes.

name: Meteor Swarm
short_description: : Four exploding spheres each deal 6d6 fire damage.

name: Shades
short_description: : As shadow conjuration, but up to 8th level and 80% real.

name: Weird
short_description: : As phantasmal killer, but affects all within 30 ft.

name: Wail of the Banshee
short_description: : Deals 10 damage/level to 1 creature/level.

name: Time Stop
short_description: : You act freely for 1d4+1 rounds.

name: Wish
short_description: M: As limited wish, but with fewer limits.
